name: The Due Date Was Yesterday
description:
The Due Date Was Yesterday 

Stressed about school? Play this game to magnify that stress to cosmic proportions!

Rush through this game trying to solve challenges to escape your schools late policy before it catches up to you. Play this game with a friend to ease the burden of your two person workload. 

Features:

  • cry doing this game solo or collaborate with a friend and cry together!
  • move around objects
  • Parkour
  • 3 Levels increasing in difficulty 
  • red wall of doom!
  • wall climbing 
Credits: 
  • Base Code by Michael Baker
  • Level Design by Yasmin Haq
  • Background Art by Yasmin Haq
  • Environmental Art Assets from 2D PlatformerAssetsPack by LaenamsoTeam on the Unity Asset Store 
  • Dinosaur Sprite Assets by ]Arks on itch.io/ @ScissorMarks on twitter

Sound:

  • Race Start by JustInvoke on Freesound 
  • jump.wav by Tissman on Freesound 
  • jumping by Leszek_Szary on Freesound
  • Background music is Playground Runaround by shortieforeva2 on Freesound
